shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the state of media stream relay across channels changes.
Occurs when the state of media stream relay across channels changes.
Callback when the state of the channel media relay changes.
Callback when the state of channel media stream relay changes.

p.codeblock: public virtual void OnChannelMediaRelayStateChanged(int state, int code) {}

section.p: Occurs when the state of media stream relay across channels changes. The SDK triggers this callback and reports the current relay state and any associated error information.
Occurs when the state of media stream relay across channels changes. The SDK triggers this callback to report the current relay state and error information.
This callback is triggered by the SDK when the state of the channel media relay changes, reporting the current relay state and related error information.
When the state of channel media stream relay changes, the SDK triggers this callback and reports the current relay state and related error information.
